Open Source projects

Only the ones worth mentioning

Fixr Telegram Bot link

A Telegram bot that sends currency values to you daily. Written in Go and backed by Redis.

A Go workshop I presented a few times. Is written using the present Golang tool, and has a few simple code samples.
